title: github actions: matrix builds
description: create a reusable matrix workflow across os, runtime, and versions.
context: prefer caching, minimal checkout depth, and reusable workflows.
instructions: 1) design a matrix covering the requested dimensions. 2) add setup with cache (actions/cache) for deps. 3) include separate steps for lint, build, test. 4) output a full workflow yaml. return code only.
model_tips: use concurrency and cancel-in-progress for prs.
risks: excessive concurrency costs; missing cache keys.
